name: Vitality Potion
description: A basic healing potion. Heals 10 HP.

name: Rusty Sword
description: A very old and rusty sword. Looks like it might break at any moment.

name: Rusty Armor
description: A very worn metal armor. A simple poke could break it.

name: Skull
description: A skull of a skeleton. Spooky!

name: Frog Leg
description: Looks gross, but it's edible. Restores 17 HP.

name: Blunt Sword
description: It was probably used too much.

name: Cracked Helmet
description: A helmet that survived a few clubs.

name: Horned Helmet
description: A helmet with long protounding horn, which can be used to pierce enemies.

name: Mind Potion
description: A potion with weak magic properties. Restores 15 MP.

name: Roof Armor
description: An armor literally made of sturdy roof plates.

name: Meitsukimune
description: A blade that spits cursed flames with each swing.
